cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has “Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value 2 or less from among them and put it onto the battlefield, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.”
Equip {2}

First strike
Other Knight creatures you control get +1/+1 and have indestructible.

Flying, vigilance
Whenever you create a token outside of your reserves, create a token that’s a copy of that token in your reserves. [i]({3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever Sandrock Blacksmith or another creature enters under your control, create a Weapon token in your reserves. [i](It’s an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.” {3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Equipment you control have “Sacrifice this Equipment: Equipped creature gains indestructible until end of turn.”

Double strike

Create X 1/1 green Knight creature tokens.

cards.special_text: Heir—You’ve created seven or more tokens this game. [i](If this card is your chosen heir in your sanctum, you may replace a draw with this card if you’ve met its condition.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may forsake. If you do it costs {2} less to cast. [i](To forsake, sacrifice creatures with total toughness 3 or more.)[/i]
Destroy all creatures.

At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a spell, put a charge counter on The Aciesblade.
{1}, Sacrifice The Aciesblade: Search your library for any number of planeswalker cards with total mana value equal to or less than the number of charge counters on The Aciesblade and put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• Create a 2/1 red Soldier creature token and a Food token.
• Sacrifice a Soldier. If you do, create a 3/3 Knight creature token that’s all colors. You gain 3 life.
• Sacrifice a Knight. If you do, create The True Heir, a legendary 5/5 white Human Noble creature token with lifelink.
Draw a card for each creature you control that dealt damage to an opponent this turn. If you drew five or more cards this way, create a 8/8 black Horror creature token.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control leave the battlefield without dying, you may create a token that’s a copy of that creature in your reserves. [i]({3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Flying
Sycophant, sycophant [i](Whenever this permanent deals damage to a player or planeswalker, the next spell you cast this turn costs {2} less to cast.)[/i]
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}: Until end of turn, Idol of Forgotten Gods becomes a 2/1 Bird artifact creature.

Deception {3}{U}{U} [i]({3}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying
Whenever Takers of Voice enters, gain control of target nonland permanent for as long as you control Takers of Voice.
Creatures you control can’t be blocked unless each creature with lesser power than that creature is also blocked.
cards.special_text: Heir—Your opponents have been dealt combat damage by unblocked creatures five or more times this game. [i](If this card is your chosen heir in your sanctum, you may replace a draw with this card if you’ve met its condition. Each creature counts separately.)[/i]

Flash
Inquisitive Otter has all triggered abilities of other creatures you control not named Inquisitive Otter. [i](A triggered ability uses the words “when,” “whenever,” or “at.”)[/i]

When Geistwald Kraken enters, if you have fewer than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference. 
Whenever you draw a card, tap target permanent and put a stun counter on it.

Flash
Flying
{U}, Forsake: Counter target noncreature spell. [i](To forsake, sacrifice creatures with total toughness 3 or more.)[/i]

As long as it’s your turn, Marilye is a 3/2 Elf Rogue creature with hexproof and indestructible.
[+1]: Tap target permanent. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
[-2]: Exile the top five cards of target opponent’s library. You may cast any number of cards exiled this way with total mana value equal to or less than the amount of damage dealt to them this turn without paying their mana costs.

cards.rules_text:
Ward—Return a creature you control to your hand.
Whenever an opponent casts their first creature spell each turn, create a token that’s a copy of it in your reserves. [i]({3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature you attacked with this turn.
Flying

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may discard a card if that creature entered this turn. If you do, return that creature to its owner’s hand.

Choose a nonland card name. Search target player’s graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile. That player shuffles their library. For each card exiled from their hand this way, you lose 2 life.

Flying
Sycophant [i](Whenever this creature deals damage to a player or planeswalker, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.)[/i]
Whenever Vance Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, mill three cards. Return one with the highest mana value to your hand, then you lose life equal to the total mana value of the other two cards milled this way.

Bloom [i](Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, you may pay that spell’s mana cost. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.)[/i]
Whenever you copy a spell, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Deception {2}{B} [i]({2}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Plaskett Trickster deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, defending player exiles a card from their sanctum at random and a card from their hand. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

Deathtouch
When Virulent Hexer enters, choose one or more —
• Remove all counters from all permanents and opponents.
• Exile all tokens in each player’s reserves.
• Exile each player’s sanctum.
• Exile all tokens.

Destroy all creatures.
End the turn. [i](Exile all spells and abilities from the stack. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and “this turn” and “until end of turn” effects end.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that’s a copy of it in your reserves. [i]({3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever Waldemar deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
When Waldemar dies, return him to the battlefield transformed under an opponent’s control if he was your chosen heir.
cards.special_text2:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life and Waldemar’s owner draws a card.
[-1]: Discard a card. If you didn’t discard a nonland card this way, Waldemar’s owner creates a tapped Treasure token.
[-2]: Sacrifice a non-Waldemar permanent.

When Hann enters, you may search your library for a land card that doesn’t share a name with a land you control or a Veceslav planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Search your library for a legendary card, exile it, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of legendary cards in your graveyard. If you don’t cast it this way, put it into your hand.
